name: Deny the Songs of War
summary: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it.
description:
To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it. You can cast deafness and 4th-level silence once per day each as innate spells. The tradition of these spells is the one you chose for the Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication feat.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
